comment.body: Lookup SourceHut, it's an free software git server like gitlab but they are working on federation(like email) between servers.
Post link to article pls. I want to be nostalgic.

I use the philips go gear. It's very simple and the battery lasts a satisfactory number of hours.

If you want, flac, ogg, 96khz sampling and 7 channels on your 1000 dollars ear-speaker, search for portable DACs.
But be aware, traveler. The road to hell is paved with bodies of audiophiles.
Of course, a true patrician would just carry a librebooted thinkpad on a backpack with a external battery and use ncmpcpp.

Have you tried looking into pleroma shit posting instances? I really haven't had much of those problems there(i.e. it werks on my machine). 

Pleroma is where all the cool kids are now, Mastodon is for boring, angry aunts. I actually though you were someone I know from there.
I just saw your blog post "The fediverse will not save us." so I will be more specific. Look for cute or anime themed instances.
Democracy is not a gift from the gods. Great things must be nourished and cared for.

Some people are completely clueless. She must think that she is making you a huge favor by giving you this job.
Look for a better boss asap.

Is this a quote from the said nazis? I'm not quite getting it.

Anyways, the ukranian sympathy for nazism is quite old, which is comic because nazis hate slavs.

When the nazis invaded ukraine the people received them with open arms, thinking they were there to save them from communism. Of course they were all raped and murdered. And to make things worse, they got the profound antipathy of Stalin, which in great part explains their poor fortune during the 20th century.
Is this mocking climate change or climate change deniers?

Children are a scam.
It's natures pyramid scheme.
The only way out of it is to bring other people in (convince them to have children) so you can pretend the kids are friends and leave yours on their house.
